title: Unknown Error
body:
Hello,
Since the last patch, I'm getting this Client Error Message, only in Client. Whenever ive made into the Game, works fine!
Couldn´t connect to the PVP Server and that Unknown Error. I think I'm getting lost packages, this is what it seems.

I tried:

1. Repair
2. Nvidia Driver Updated (worked fine with my older CD-BackUp Driver, with older LoL.Client Patch)
2. Firewall shutted off (PC and Router)
3. services.msc -> IP-Help... -> disabled

What should i do more about that issue?

I lost so many LP because of that, i done nothing with my running System.
Please, need Help!
Thank you
